projects.title: Beck Depression Inventory
projects.description: Take the Beck Depression Inventory (BDI) assessment online. A free, confidential 21-item questionnaire to evaluate depression symptoms and their severity.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A portfolio website for myself, which you're browsing through right now! Using React with Shadcn/UI and TailwindCSS - with AI-assist

projects.title: Retirement Calculator
projects.description: A handy tool to calculate your inflation-adjusted retirement savings with ease. Using Vuetify and Vue.js with AI-assist

projects.title: Kindle Highlights to Wallpapers
projects.description: A tool for creating beautiful wallpapers from your Kindle highlights. Using React with AI-assist
